metadata.title: CVE-2018-6521 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - low
metadata.description:
The sqlauth module in SimpleSAMLphp before 1.15.2 relies on the MySQL utf8charset, which truncates queries upon encountering four-byte characters.There might be a scenario in which this allows remote attackers to bypassintended access restrictions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-6521` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

simplesamlphp - 1.15.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.15.2-1').
